p: Through the participation of a member of the Andalusian Transplant Coordination in the International Society for Cell & Gene Therapy Presidential Task Force on the Use of Unproven and/or Unethical Cell and Gene Therapies, the transplant coordination is collaborating in the drawing up of informative documents aimed at multiple groups, especially patients [36], to help prevent them from undergoing treatments without sufficient guarantees of quality, safety and efficacy.
